title: Can't log into client but can on the website.
body: As title, I can't log into client. It says wrong password or username. I am using EU Nordic and East on both.  I can easily log into the site. Also I can change my password, done it multiple times.

replies.body: There was an issue a few days ago that caused a login error like this, and was a result of a patch mismatch.  We'll want to take a closer look here in case that issue is recurring.  To help troubleshoot, start off with a client restart.  If that doesn't work, try swapping to another region on the login screen, then back to your region.  Let me know if these steps work for you.
Soooooo....9 months later and this is STILL a problem?! was excited to play this game again but forget it, shit doesn't want t work at all and is a waist of my time now, thanks.

Im still having this same issue, ive tried swapping regions and restarting client but that hasn't worked. Im confused because i tried logging a different account and it logged in fine. when i got to log into my normalk account again it wont work. so i can log into one account not the other on the same computer and same internet. started for me yesterday and still happening today. i feel there is an issue with my account information or something? or is it this patch issue and a repatch will fix?
Same problem, would love to get some help
I'm having the same issue, could it be that multiple people are having the same issue at the same time?
